document.full_text: first lady michelle obama will appear on children's tv show "icarly," -- a favorite program of her daughters -- to promote her initiative to support military families, the network behind the show said on wednesday.
document.title: first lady michelle obama to appear on "icarly"
lines_and_colors: first lady michelle obama will appear on children's tv show "icarly," -- a favorite program of her daughters -- to promote her initiative to support military families, the network behind the show said on wednesday.
